short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Papa’s Cupcakeria Official as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

short.fil: I-play ang Papa's Cupcakeria Official bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari rin I-play nang walang Internet, subukan ngayon!

short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램으로 파파의 컵케이크 가게를 플레이하세요. 인터넷이 없어도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 바로 시도해보세요!

short.nl: Speel Papa's Cupcakeria Official als Chrome-extensie - Je kunt ook spelen zonder internet, probeer het nu!
short.no: Juega a Papa's Cupcakeria Official como una extensión de Chrome. Además, puedes jugar sin internet, ¡pruébalo ahora mismo!
short.pl: Zagraj w oficjalną Papą Cupcakerię jako rozszerzenie do Chrome'a - Możesz również grać bez połączenia internetowego, wypróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Jucați Papa's Cupcakeria Official ca o extensie Chrome - De asemenea, poate fi jucat fără internet, încercați acum!
short.ru: Играйте в официальный Papa's Cupcakeria как расширение для Chrome - теперь можно играть без интернета, попробуйте прямо сейчас!

short.th: เล่น Papa's Cupcakeria Official เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเล่นตอนนี้!
short.tr: Juega a Papa's Cupcakeria Official como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!

short.vi: Chơi Papa's Cupcakeria Official như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 作为Chrome扩展程序玩"Papa's Cupcakeria Official" - 也可以在没有网络的情况下玩，现在试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 以 Chrome 擴充功能的形式玩 Papa's Cupcakeria Official - 也可以在沒有網路的情況下玩，現在試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This game is an official installment in the popular "Papa's" series of time-management and simulation games created by Flipline Studios. In this game, players take on the role of a cupcake chef working. The objective is to manage various tasks in the cupcake shop and serve delicious cupcakes to customers.

Game Overview:

Job Roles: Players start as a cupcake chef and are responsible for taking customer orders, baking cupcakes, decorating them, and serving them to satisfy the customers.

Gameplay: The gameplay involves a time-management system where players must efficiently complete tasks to earn tips and make their customers happy. The more satisfied the customers, the better the tips.

Station Management: The game features different stations for various tasks, including the order station, batter station, bake station, frosting station, topping station, and the serve station. Players must master each station to excel in the game.

Customization: One of the key aspects of the game is the ability to customize cupcakes with a wide variety of flavors, frostings, and toppings. Experiment with different combinations to create unique and appealing cupcakes.

Upgrades: As players progress, they can use their earnings to purchase upgrades for the shop, unlocking new features and items to enhance gameplay.

Mini-Games: Completing certain tasks may unlock mini-games that provide additional challenges and rewards.

Controls:

Mouse: Use the mouse to navigate through the game, interact with objects, and complete tasks.

Click and Drag: Drag ingredients to mix batter, decorate cupcakes, and perform other in-game actions.

Point and Click: Navigate menus, take orders, and serve customers by clicking on the appropriate items.

It provides a fun and engaging gaming experience for fans of time-management and simulation games. Enjoy the delicious world of cupcakes as you strive to become the ultimate cupcake chef in this game! 🧁🍰
